Travel Planner 📅
Welcome! I created this super simple web app as a capstone project for completing Udacity's nanodegree in front-end web development. This project is designed to bring together what I learned from all previous projects (e.g. Website Layout, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, Web APIs, Asynchronous apps, build tools, etc.). It is also designed to calm down the travel bug inside of me during this strange time of COVID-19. Feedbacks are encouraged!
